records.location_details: A Standing Corps Officer (SCO) was detained following a domestic altercation at their accommodation, then transferred to a local Police Station, and later escorted to court before the Judicial Authority.
records.where_clear: Accommodation, local Police Station, and court in an unspecified location.
records.uncertainty_note: Specific city and country are redacted.

possible_violations.violation_name: Violation of Code of Conduct provisions

records.context_note: A Standing Corps Officer (SCO) was temporarily detained by police following a domestic altercation with his spouse, leading to allegations of domestic violence. The SCO was transferred to a police station and later escorted to court.
records.evidence_quote: Alleged domestic violence by SC. SCO was detained due to alleged domestic altercation with his wife.
